column4: I've found this http://www.cyberciti.biz/tips/debian-ubuntu-linux-configure-pinnacle-pctv-tuner.html. I'm following your struggle because I'm also looking for a TV capture card.
have you figured out where the audio goes? You've a 10pin connector http://tinypic.com/view.php?pic=8wecy9&s=3 . No line level, only mic.
did you manage to get audio from your video capture card?
